name: hunyuan-video
notes_16gb: Heavy model. Use --lowvram and conservative settings (batch=1, 480p, fewer frames). Text-to-video only.
notes_20gb: Full T2V and I2V workflows. 720p generation supported. Use --highvram for best performance.
description: Hunyuan Video - 13B DiT for text-to-video and image-to-video generation.
